channel.title: Run.bat error when I try to do a command
channel.description:
So as stated in the subject, I d/c anytime I try to use a command. I've been trying to figure out this run.bat error I get when I try to use a command. for the past 3 hours to no avail so I decided to post here asking if anyone knows what I can do. sk8ter i think his name was, helped me a bit. he got the update command working but anytime I use it, it also does the ::smoke command. I get no errors with using ::update but any other command disconnects me and gives me this error
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at server.model.players.packets.Commands.AdminCommands(Commands.java:882) at server.model.players.packets.Commands.proccessPacket(Commands.java:71) at server.model.players.packHandler.proccessPacket(PacketHandler.java:138) at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:3499) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.pocess(PlayerHandler.java:300) at server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:29) at server.Server$1.execute(Server.java:145) at server task.Task.tick(Task.java:107) at server.task.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Here's my Commands.java in case that helps [url=http://pastebin.com/VWMrBRVS]http://pastebin.com/VWMrBRVS[/url]

item.title: Run.bat error when I try to do a command
item.dc:creator: @RunePKn00b RunePKn00b
item.description:
@RunePKn00b wrote:

So as stated in the subject, I d/c anytime I try to use a command. I’ve been trying to figure out this run.bat error I get when I try to use a command. for the past 3 hours to no avail so I decided to post here asking if anyone knows what I can do. sk8ter i think his name was, helped me a bit. he got the update command working but anytime I use it, it also does the ::smoke command. I get no errors with using ::update but any other command disconnects me and gives me this error

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at server.model.players.packets.Commands.AdminCommands(Commands.java:882) at server.model.players.packets.Commands.proccessPacket(Commands.java:71) at server.model.players.packHandler.proccessPacket(PacketHandler.java:138) at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:3499) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.pocess(PlayerHandler.java:300) at server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:29) at server.Server$1.execute(Server.java:145) at server task.Task.tick(Task.java:107) at server.task.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Here’s my Commands.java in case that helps http://pastebin.com/VWMrBRVS
